description.value:
Source Ultimate Equipment pg. 92, Advanced Player's Guide pg. 185, Adventurer's Armory pg. 19
Price 1 gp; Weight 1 lb.
Category Entertainment

Description

Whether bent, colored, or scratched, marked cards allow an informed user to know whatâ€™s on the front of the card by viewing the mark on the back. Realizing that the cards are marked requires a DC 25 Perception check or DC 20 Profession (gambler) check. The listed price is for a common paper deck.
